name: cats1cld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(c0, cword(c1), co(c2, cconcat, cs1(c3)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, cconcat, cs1(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(co(c2, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cword(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
-| wceq(c0, co(c2, cconcat, cs1(c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(co(c2, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cword(c1)))

stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c2[++]<" c3 ">)∈ Word(c1), c2 ∈ Word(c1), <" c3 "> ∈ Word(c1))

body.origin:

comment: Closure of concatenation with a singleton word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
